user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which wealthy liberal people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.
All cultures are equal.
Everyone has an innate talent they can be successful at.<COMPLETION_START>A vegetarian diet is the healthiest way to eat.
Climate change is the biggest threat to humanity.
All religions are equally valid and true.
The gender pay gap is caused solely by discrimination.
Socialism has never failed, it has just never been implemented correctly.
Guns are the cause of all violence in America.
Capitalism is inherently evil and oppressive.
All people are inherently good and kind.
The United States is a racist country.
Immigrants commit fewer crimes than native-born citizens.
Multiculturalism is always beneficial to society.
The world would be a better place if there were no borders.
All vaccines are completely safe and without side effects.
The death penalty does not deter crime.
All white people are privileged and oppress people of color.
The world would be a better place if everyone had the same income.<COMPLETION_END>
